author: devante knight
blurb: "MAMA'Z BA-B" is the story of Marcus Williams who struggles to find a place for himself as a young black male.

author: Lawrence F. Jackson
blurb: Movie on teen inter racial dating & college co eds Inter racial marriage-parental & police conflicts.

author: MEZONIC
blurb: Mezonic hasn't released a full album (CD) since 2012. He is currently working on his fifth album. Help Mezonic fund this great project.

author: Meaghan Ogilvie
pname: Requiem of Water - Underwater photography exhibition
blurb: Requiem of Water  - A unique photography exhibition capturing our relationship to water for the Toronto 2015 PanAm/Parapan Am Games.

author: Ellarose Obioha
blurb: I am creating a EP and a 30 city tour. If you miss the feeling real music gave you back in the 70s to early 2000s I am that Artist.

blurb: Help Kickfucker! A short film about a man with a strange sex addiction, who fails at crowd funding and whose life takes a dark turn.

author: Douglas Akers
blurb: Based on my disabilities I would like to continue my therapy by creating small stained glass for my home and the VA TBI center.

blurb: My name is Jeff Cornelius, a fine artist looking to offer exceptional artwork created on genuine birch bark, from dead & down trees.
